About

I'm a graduate student at the Interactive Telecommunications Program at New York University. I build things using Ruby, Javascript, Arduino, electronics and wood. From hardware to software and useful to useless.

If you want to know more you can read about my projects on my blog, or fork the code from these projects on Github. And a bit more lighthearted and foolish, see photos I take on Tumblr, and read my tweets.

Email me at
